'''Unheard Confession''' is [[Furina]]'s [[4th Ascension Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* Furina must have at least '''40,000''' Max HP to achieve the maximum buffs.
** The DMG Bonus and interval decrease from the passive is linear to Furina's Max HP and not stepwise at every 1,000 points of Max HP, meaning the DMG Bonus and interval decrease is equal to 0.07% and 0.04% of her Max HP respectively, until the maximum buff is reached.
